author: Linus Torvalds
quotation: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Tim Kadlec
quotation: Blame the implementation, not the technique.

author: Ralph William Gosper, Jr.
quotation: A data structure is just a stupid programming language.

author: Antonin Januska
quotation: A foreach loop avoided is a CPU cycle earned.

author: David Gries
quotation: A formal parsing algorithm should not always be used.
